ComicInfo.Title: Guns Roar in Rio Mesa; Trapped; When the Kid Lost a Gunfight
ComicInfo.Summary:
Guns Roar in Rio Mesa: Kid Colt helps Harper against the Barrows even though Harper thinks he's a crook. Harper learns better and becomes Rio Mesa's new sheriff.
Trapped: A band of men in a bar try to catch Colt so they can collect the reward on him but Colt escapes.
When the Kid Lost a Gunfight: When Sheriff Lawson loses his nerve Kid Colt allows him to win a gunfight to prop up his ego.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
